game

Enum Manager.Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Manager.Notification>
      • game.Manager.Notification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Manager.Notification>
    Enclosing class:
    Manager

    public static enum Manager.Notification
extends java.lang.Enum<Manager.Notification>
    Message options from a truck to a manager include the following. Unless otherwise noted, the truck's status will be WAITING whenever a notification is fired. Exceptions are TRAVELING_TO_CHANGED (always) and STATUS_CHANGED (sometimes).

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DROPPED_OFF_PARCEL
      Notification sent whenever a truck drops off up a parcel
      GOING_TO_CHANGED
      Notification sent whenever a truck's goingTo field - what Node the truck will end up at when the current travel queue is exhausted - changes.
      LOCATION_CHANGED
      Notification sent whenever a truck's location field -- what Node the truck is currently on -- changes.
      PARCEL_AT_NODE
      Notification sent whenever a truck arrives at a node that contains at least one parcel.
      PICKED_UP_PARCEL
      Notification sent whenever a truck picks up a parcel
      STATUS_CHANGED
      Notification sent whenever a truck's traveling/waiting status changes.
      TRAVELING_TO_CHANGED
      Notification Sent whenever a truck's field travelingTo field - what Node the truck is currently traveling toward changes.
      WAITING
      Notification sent whenever a truck is waiting without any travel directions.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • WAITING

        public static final Manager.Notification WAITING
        Notification sent whenever a truck is waiting without any travel directions. Sent every time the truck checks that it still has no travel directions - Every Truck.WAIT_TIME ms.

      • LOCATION_CHANGED

        public static final Manager.Notification LOCATION_CHANGED
        Notification sent whenever a truck's location field -- what Node the truck is currently on -- changes. This occurs whenever a truck reaches a new node

      • TRAVELING_TO_CHANGED

        public static final Manager.Notification TRAVELING_TO_CHANGED
        Notification Sent whenever a truck's field travelingTo field - what Node the truck is currently traveling toward changes. This occurs whenever a truck leaves a node towards a new node. Thus this will be fired only while a Truck is traveling, not waiting.

      • GOING_TO_CHANGED

        public static final Manager.Notification GOING_TO_CHANGED
        Notification sent whenever a truck's goingTo field - what Node the truck will end up at when the current travel queue is exhausted - changes. This occurs whenever a new edge is added to a truck's travel directions.

      • STATUS_CHANGED

        public static final Manager.Notification STATUS_CHANGED
        Notification sent whenever a truck's traveling/waiting status changes. This occurs whenever a truck begins traveling or stops traveling. Status has successfully been changed when the notification is fired, so if the truck's status is TRAVELING and the STATUS_CHANGED notification is fired, the truck just had its status changed to TRAVELING and is now TRAVELING.

      • PARCEL_AT_NODE

        public static final Manager.Notification PARCEL_AT_NODE
        Notification sent whenever a truck arrives at a node that contains at least one parcel. A PARCEL_AT_NODE notification is fired after a LOCATION_CHANGED notification

      • PICKED_UP_PARCEL

        public static final Manager.Notification PICKED_UP_PARCEL
        Notification sent whenever a truck picks up a parcel

      • DROPPED_OFF_PARCEL

        public static final Manager.Notification DROPPED_OFF_PARCEL
        Notification sent whenever a truck drops off up a parcel
